title: XDM Custom Object
description: XDM Custom Object is a standard Experience Data Model (XDM) class that captures the minimum required properties of a custom object. This XDM class can only be included in the profile for customers with the B2B or B2P Edition.

xdm:customObjectID.title: Object ID
xdm:customObjectID.description: Unique ID for the custom object.

xdm:customObjectKey.title: Object Key
xdm:customObjectKey.description: Unique composite key identifier for the B2B Custom Object.
